title: FS: Lot of 43 Graded T205 w/ HOFers
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 43 Graded T205 w/ HOFers
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale. These are all graded, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

I also just listed a large lot of mid to higher grade raw T205s, with Mathewson, Speaker, and many other HOFers and SPs:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2502560[/url]

**ALL CARDS SOLD OR MOVED TO UPDATED LISTING**

Marc,
My seat belt is fastened; ready for another, Wild Ride!
I'll take Schulte AB.
PM sent.
Ben
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Nice Cobb, Matty, and several other HOFers and SPs still available!
Bump for an update to the list of available cards and a price drop.  Most of these priced well below what comparable examples have sold for recently.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
I'll take Bailey.
PM sent.
Ben
Bump for a final price drop on the remaining cards before I list them for auction.  All of these priced below what similar comparable examples have sold for recently.  Thanks for looking!
